text:
Hi :wave:
I am getting a `500 internal error` while executing the following request `DELETE /automation/v2/workflows/:workflowId/enrollments/contacts/:email`

Is this endpoint still available and maintained?

Error: `{"status":"error","message":"internal error","correlationId":"b01af03c-7ed3-4ce3-8649-10e945a2ed7b"}`
Documentation found at: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/workflows/>
